Articles.Content: I'm looking for a mod with an antenna part that, when you place it on the vessel you can see vessel info in your browser by typing the adress the game gives you when you when you are on the launchpad. Someone also used this mod in KerbalKon, I can't remember who exactly, 1 guy was flying the rocket in IVA view and one guy was reading the information about the vessel in the browser. I hope you understand what mod I'm looking for and sorry if my english is bad

I think this is it:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24594-0-23-Telemachus-%E2%80%93-Telemetry-and-Flight-Control-in-the-Web-Browser-(2014-1-11)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/telemachus/
That's the one XD Thank you very much!
